new.title: Brand new network management
new.description: Navigate between All, Popular and your Favourite networks modes

new.title: Use only prefarable chains
new.description: You can customise your favourite networks and work only with the ones you prefer

new.title: Single or multiple network mode
new.description: You’re free to choose a single network or a set of networks to operate with your assets

new.title: Multi-network state for the Asset details screen
new.description: You can see any particular asset and its balances on multiple networks on one screen

new.title: Navigate assets across a vast range of networks fearlessly
new.description: You can easily choose your asset on a specific network and do whatever you want to do with it
